content: DBS Vickers Securities Bank Account Investments Asked by Casey ChooAsked on 11 Mar 2019Is there any distinct difference between a self-directed and broker-assisted online cash trading account?Hi there! Nicholes WongLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Self-directed means u buy the stocks urself and it will have cheaper fees. While broker-assisted means a guy will help u out but higher fees1 comment0
